data.md:MetaData: Meteorological observations during SWALLOW cruise from Monopin Hill started at 1750-08-12

Ship: Swallow (Sloop), Start of voyage: 1750-08-23, End of voyage: 1750-09-17, Voyage from: Monopin Hill, 1st Observer: Henry Speke (Captain), 2nd Observer: John Kestell (1st Officer/Master), Company: Royal Navy, Other ship information: 10G 272BM
CLIWOC: A Climatological Database for the World's Oceans 1750–1854 (and 10 more publications about CLIWOC results in the same volume)
